party_a_name: Electric City Corp., a Delaware corporation
liability_cap: No explicit overall monetary liability cap stated; agreement excludes consequential or liquidated damages for late delivery unless Company specifically acknowledges and agrees in writing.
risk_explanation: This is a long-term (10-year) exclusive distributor agreement with termination for cause on 30 daysâ€™ notice, which can create lock-in and operational risk. There is no clear overall cap on liability, though consequential/liquidated damages for late delivery are disclaimed unless expressly agreed. The agreement also includes injunctive relief provisions and a non-solicitation/non-compete style restriction, increasing enforcement and business risk.
